name: AppClipAdvancedExperienceLocalization.Attributes
desc: The attributes that describe an Advanced App Clip Experience Localizations resource.

items.name: language
items.desc: A string that identifies the language of the advanced App Clip experience.

items.name: subtitle
items.desc: The subtitle that appears on the App Clip card for the advanced App Clip experience.

items.name: title
items.desc: The title that appears on the App Clip card for the advanced App Clip experience.
